reviews.review_msg: All around great teacher. Lectures were very informative and engaging. Fair marker, gives great insight , hints for what to study and whats relevant on tests. Would not recommend even getting the text book, as long as you attend all the lectures you'll do well.

This lady is a bit intense but very schooled. Her lectures are very informative. There are no surprises when it comes to the exams, but there is A LOT to know. Labs were decent. The field trip was rad. Generally a good course/prof.

Lectures often end short but I have no idea how because she usually crams 70-slide powerpoints full to the brim with information and terminology. There is SO much dry information that I have no idea how we're supposed to know it all for the tests. Brutal terms and math and physics. Labs are fun and easy. Lecture slides are posted after the class.
